title: Nice app
comment: Probably lacks '.', ':' and numeric buttons (may be on a long tap?)

title: Anysoft != any soft
comment: I was puzzled for a while,  thinking this would work with any soft-keyboard.  It actually needs the keyboard program by "Anysoft" !

title: Perfect :-)
comment: Just what I needed or I could not access arrow up for command history. Using ConnectBot with Samsung Galaxy Ace to access SSH on Ubuntu machine. Thanks 4 job well done
